name: 👾 Foreign Frugglers
detailed_description:
The Fruggle is real!
Four brave survivors need to protect mother earth from spacey invaders in this
pixelated arcade style 2d shoot 'm up.
Use different types of weapons to shoot those bastards, rack up your score, and don't get 'Fruggled'.

Webgame hit 'Foreign Frugglers' just landed on Steam, Expanded and improved.

Features:
-Classic arcade mode
-Improved and perfected
-Retro color palettes
-CTR-filter and screen effects
-Xbox controller support
-Local highscores
-Local medals/achievements
-Steam highscores
-Steam achievements
-Steam Badges

Extra content that will be added later on:
-Endless mode
-Ultimo mode
-more color palettes and whatnot

Designed and developed by ULTIMO.

short_description: The Fruggle is real! Four brave survivors need to protect mother earth from spacey invaders in this pixelated arcade style 2d shoot 'm up.
reviews:
“If you like fast arcade-game style gameplay infused with modern powerup elements topped with loud explosions and satisfying eye-candy artwork, then you won't want to pass up Foreign Frugglers!”
n/a – Indie Retro News

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works well on most PC's, needs graphics card for optimal performance. (gaming laptop)

legal_notice: The 'Foreign Frugglers' game name, concept, design is designed by Ultimo Games (Timo Visser)
